name: SpotCrime
0:
”Alexa ask spot crime about recent crime in two zero zero zero one”
”Alexa ask spot crime for crime in two zero zero zero one”
”Alexa ask spot crime to report on recent crime in two zero zero zero one”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spot crime
des:
This skill will allow you to learn about recent crime information in your neighborhood. From burglaries and thefts to assaults and shootings. Alexa will tell you when and where the most recent violent and non-violent crimes have occurred in your zip code.

Find out more detail about what crime incidents are happening near you by heading to SpotCrime.com for free personalized email alerts.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
